nodes.text: A New Hope: The Princess, the Scoundrel, and the Farm Boy (audiobook)

A New Hope: The Princess, the Scoundrel, and the Farm Boy is the unabridged audio version of the canon young-readers novel of the same name, written by Alexandra Bracken. The audiobook was performed by Marc Thompson and Rebecca Soler, and was released by Listening Library on September 22, 2015.
